verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. They who trust in Jehovah shall be like Mount Zion; it is not shaken; it remains forever.
The mountains are all around her. Jerusalem; and Jehovah is all around His people, from this time and forever.
For the rod of wickedness shall not rest on the lot of the righteous ones; that the righteous ones not put forth their hands to injustice.
Do good, O Jehovah, to the good ones, and to the upright ones in their heart.
And those who turn aside to their crooked ways, Jehovah shall lead them forth with the doers of iniquity. Peace be upon Israel.
